siurianstaff.name: Siurian Staff
siurianstaff.note: Fully restores the durability of a weapon or item in an adjacent ally's possession [60 EXP]

impetusstaff.name: Impetus Staff
impetusstaff.note: Allows an adjacent ally to take action again [80 EXP]

nelkesstaff.name: Nelke's Staff☆
nelkesstaff.note:
Allows a nearby ally to take action again [50 EXP]
Nelke only
